Nov. 22, 2014 D SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Fourth Section)
SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest sewbba-blaenavon-contest-fourth-section
Rhydycar Leisure Centre, Merthyr Tydfil, Merthyr Tydfil County, Wales, UK Contest moved from Blaenavon Workmens' Hall to Merthyr Tydfil Leisure Centre.
Best Instrumentalist: Jamie Jones (euphonium) - Usk Brass
2014: Welsh League Champion: Newport Borough Runner-Up: Usk Brass
March 19, 2014, 7:03 p.m. Nov. 25, 2014, 9:47 a.m.
1 Usk Brass Band Jeff Jones Lindum Suite
2 Newport Borough Band Robin Hackett Four Cities Symphony

4 Vale of Glamorgan Band David Short Divertimento [Kelly]
